nodes.text: "Dobra Doompa" was a song performed at Maz Kanata's castle by Shag Kava, a traveling band made up of the musicians Taybin Ralorsa, Infrablue Zedbeddy Coggins, Ubert "Sticks" Quaril and Sudswater Dillifay Glon.
"Dobra Doompa" was written by the composer and actor Lin-Manuel Miranda for Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, which was released in North America on December 18, 2015.
